Q: Apache PDFBox uses ~1.6 GB RAM to render a 1-page scanned PDF — should I optimize Java or switch to PyMuPDF (Python)? A:

OK WHY would one page RENDERED be vastly different to another as basic rendering to one format @ one density is in theory no different per source ? If you are focused on a PAGE the output (reproduction of any page) should be roughly the same. Apart from some sources are memory intensive due to vectors or some images are overly dense, and thus totally needing "Banding"

Q: What would be the simplest way of calculating a conditional total? A:

Try the following formula-

=SUM(FILTER(F2:F6,(WEEKDAY(D2:D6)>1)*(WEEKDAY(D2:D6)<7)))

WEEKDAY(D2:D6)>1 indicates weekday greater than 1 means from Monday and WEEKDAY(D2:D6)<7 means till Friday.
